Welcome to Aspen Tap

Aspen’s Gastropub & Craft Brewery Downstream from nobody. Location: 121 South Galena Street, Aspen Colorado 81611 Phone: (970) 710-2461 Hours: Open every day. 8am - midnight Happy Hour 4-7pm Monday - Friday. Kitchen: Noon - 10pm daily. No reservations. Aspen Tap is a full service restaurant & gastropub. As an affiliate of Aspen Brewing Company, Aspen Tap features Aspen’s award winning beers alongside craft cocktails, great wines, cider, non-alcoholic beverages complimented by a full lunch and dinner menu in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. New on tap: Rescue Brew - Colorado Amber Lager in support of Mountain Rescue Aspen & Aspen Volunteer Fire Department $7 pints. Today’s Special: Local grass & barley fed beef sliders - three for $12. Events: Tuesday Cruiseday @ 6pm. Drink Menu Image: Food Menu Image: Follow us on Social: @AspenBrewingCompany Event Inquiries: email Duncan@aspenbrewingcompany.com
